body_html:
Well, with help of my colleague we found out what the problem was. I am using a dual GPU notebook and I didn't switch it to the Nvidia card..

Super silly but I would expect some error about GPU drivers at the very minimum if not directly saying "You are not using Nvidia GPU!", not segfault. I am wondering if it was only my problem or more general, I saw a lot of these (like #4101).

Anyway, that would be my suggestion to improve.

body:
Well, with help of my colleague we found out what the problem was. I am using a dual GPU notebook and I didn't switch it to the Nvidia card..

Super silly but I would expect some error about GPU drivers at the very minimum if not directly saying "You are not using Nvidia GPU!", not segfault. I am wondering if it was only my problem or more general, I saw a lot of these (like #4101).

Anyway, that would be my suggestion to improve.
